00025 #ifndef AERYN_HENNEY_FUNCTION_PTR_HPP
00026 #define AERYN_HENNEY_FUNCTION_PTR_HPP
00027 
00028 #include <string>
00029 #include <sstream>
00030 
00031 namespace Aeryn
00032 {
00033         namespace Henney
00034         {
00042                 class function_ptr
00043                 {
00044                 public:
00046                         function_ptr()
00047                                 : body(0)
00048                         {
00049                         }
00050 
00054                         template<typename nullary_function>
00055                         function_ptr(nullary_function function )
00056                                 : body(new nullary_adaptor<nullary_function >(function) )
00057                         {
00058                         }
00059 
00065                         template<typename unary_function, typename param_type>
00066                                 function_ptr(unary_function function,  param_type param )
00067                                 : body(new unary_adaptor<unary_function, param_type>(function,param))
00068                         {
00069                         }
00070 
00072                         function_ptr(const function_ptr &other)
00073                                 : body(other.body ? other.body->clone() : 0)
00074                         {
00075                         }
00076 
00078                         ~function_ptr()
00079                         {
00080                                 delete body;
00081                         }
00082 
00084                         function_ptr &operator=(const function_ptr &rhs)
00085                         {
00086                                 callable *old_body = body;
00087                                 body = rhs.body ? rhs.body->clone() : 0;
00088                                 delete old_body;
00089                                 return *this;
00090                         }
00091 
00093                         void operator()() const
00094                         {
00095                                 if(body)
00096                                         body->call();
00097                         }
00098 
00100                         function_ptr &operator*()
00101                         {
00102                                 return *this;
00103                         }
00104 
00106                         const function_ptr &operator*() const
00107                         {
00108                                 return *this;
00109                         }
00110 
00111                         bool has_context() const
00112                         {
00113                                 return body->has_context();
00114                         }
00115 
00116                         std::string context_string() const
00117                         {
00118                                 return body->context_string();
00119                         }
00120 
00121                 private:
00128                         class callable
00129                         {
00130                         public:
00132                                 virtual ~callable()
00133                                 {
00134                                 }
00135 
00137                                 virtual callable *clone() const = 0;
00138 
00140                                 virtual void call() = 0;
00141 
00142                                 virtual bool has_context() const = 0;
00143 
00144                                 virtual std::string context_string() const = 0;
00145                         };
00146 
00152                         template<typename unary_function, typename param_type>
00153                         class unary_adaptor : public callable
00154                         {
00155                         public:
00161                                 unary_adaptor(unary_function function, param_type param)
00162                                         : adaptee(function), param( param )
00163                                 {
00164                                 }
00165 
00170                                 virtual callable *clone() const
00171                                 {
00172                                         return new unary_adaptor<unary_function, param_type>(adaptee,param);
00173                                 }
00174 
00179                                 virtual void call( )
00180                                 {
00181                                         adaptee( param );
00182                                 }
00183 
00184                                 virtual bool has_context() const
00185                                 {
00186                                         return true;
00187                                 }
00188 
00189                                 virtual std::string context_string() const
00190                                 {
00191                                         std::stringstream str;
00192                                         str << param;
00193                                         return str.str();
00194                                 }
00195 
00196                         private:
00198                                 unary_function adaptee;
00199 
00201                                 param_type param;
00202                         };
00203 
00209                         template<typename nullary_function>
00210                         class nullary_adaptor : public callable
00211                         {
00212                         public:
00217                                 nullary_adaptor(nullary_function function)
00218                                         : adaptee(function)
00219                                 {
00220                                 }
00221 
00226                                 virtual callable *clone() const
00227                                 {
00228                                         return new nullary_adaptor<nullary_function>( adaptee );
00229                                 }
00230 
00232                                 virtual void call( )
00233                                 {
00234                                         adaptee();
00235                                 }
00236 
00237                                 virtual bool has_context() const
00238                                 {
00239                                         return false;
00240                                 }
00241 
00242                                 virtual std::string context_string() const
00243                                 {
00244                                         return "";
00245                                 }
00246 
00247                         private:                                
00249                                 nullary_function adaptee;                               
00250                         };
00251 
00253                         callable *body;
00254                 };
00255         }
00256 
00258         typedef Henney::function_ptr FunctionPtr;
00259 }
